page.title: 01GENERAL REVIEW - Lydham/More
page.content: This rural area of{hilly and low land is near the{Welsh Border}(Land height- 150m to 450m). It consists mainly of the parishes of Lydham and More. It is an{Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty with few amenities. Residents travel out of the area to meet their needs socially and educationally and to do shopping.{Farming}is the main use of the land. There are large farms and small holdings. More Quarry and concrete block factory provided jobs until closure 10 yrs ago. The Dolerite stone was excellent for road making because of its hardness. The area is of interest to the geologist, historian, archaeologist & naturalist. There is a wide variety of flora and fauna. This is a very{pleasant area}in which to live and residents are generally happy, pleasant, helpful people who form a{friendly community.
